mapper.update: update mkt_cam_recom_calc_rel set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ALGORITHMS_RUL_ID = #{algorithmsRulId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_RECOM_CALC_REL_ID = #{evtRecomCalcRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_RECOM_CALC_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ALGO_ID, ALGORITHMS_RUL_ID, PRIORITY, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from mkt_cam_recom_calc_rel where EVT_RECOM_CALC_REL_ID = #{evtRecomCalcRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
